menu.name: margherita
menu.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, and basil leaves.

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.

menu.name: pepperoni
menu.description: A popular American-style pizza with a base of tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese, topped with slices of pepperoni (spicy salami).

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.

menu.name: neapolitan
menu.description: Originating from Naples, Italy, this pizza features a thin, soft crust topped with fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.

menu.name: hawaiian
menu.description: A controversial pizza that typically includes tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, and pineapple. Its sweet and savory combination has garnered both lovers and critics.

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.

menu.name: four Cheese (quattro formaggi)
menu.description: A cheesy delight featuring a combination of four different cheeses, such as mozzarella, Gorgonzola, Parmesan, and Fontina.

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken
menu.description: A pizza variant with a barbecue sauce base, topped with grilled chicken, red onions, and sometimes accompanied by bacon and cilantro.

reviews.comment: The pizza was amazing! Highly recommended.
Decent pizza, but a bit too greasy for my taste.
